mapper.insert: insert into datas (id, number, title, type, icon, content, pageview, points, release_by, release_time, status, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_delete) values (#{id}, #{number}, #{title}, #{type}, #{icon}, #{content}, #{pageview}, #{points}, #{releaseBy}, #{releaseTime}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{isDelete})
mapper.update: update datas set is_delete = 1 where id in #{id}
mapper.select: select d.number, d.title,d.type, d.icon, d.content, d.points,d.pageview, u1.user_name as releaseName, d.release_time as releaseTime, d.status, d.update_time as updateTime, u2.user_name as updateName from datas d left join user u1 on d.release_by = u1.id left join user u2 on d.update_by = u2.id where d.id = #{id} and d.is_delete = 2
